page.title: 07 PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content:
THESE GAMES ARE BEING PLAYED ON THE SUTTON PARK PRIMARY SCHOOL PLAYGROUND. {PIG IN THE MIDDLE} THE RULES ARE SOMEONE HAS TO BE IN THE MIDDLE AND TWO PEOPLE HAVE TO BE OUTSIDE. THE CHILD IN THE MIDDLE HAS TO CATCH THE BALL WHICH THE PEOPLE THROW TO EACH OTHER. THE CHILD IN THE MIDDLE HAS TO JUMP UP AND CATCH IT FROM THE SKY. IF THE CHILD CATCHES IT THE PERSON WHO THROWS THE BALL HAS TO BE IN THE MIDDLE.
THIS IS A {SKIPPING GAME.}TO PLAY THE GAME YOU NEED A PIECE OF ROPE AND YOU TURN THE ROPE. THEN IT IS ANOTHER PERSON'S GO. WE SING, {GRANDMA'S IN THE KITCHEN { DOING A BIT OF STITCHING. { HOW MANY STITCHES DID SHE DO?} IF WE SAY 5 THEY HAVE TO SKIP 5 TIMES. {
